```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
```


```{r, echo=FALSE}
x <- read_rds("enrollment.rds") %>% 
  select(course_department, course_title, course_name, u_grad) %>% 
  arrange(desc(u_grad)) %>% 
  filter(!is.na(course_name)) %>% 
  head(10)

x %>% 
  kable(caption= "Enrollments")
```
